name: SPACEJUMP
description:
An unnamed undercover policeman is given a new task, to destroy all aliens on a secret planet.
He is armed with a spaceship, flying pandas, an aggressive space rooster that will peck aliens to death.
The goal of the game is to complete the level.
But it's not as easy as it may seem, there are several types of aliens who are trying to stop you.

- Various enemies
- Beautiful design
- Fascinating atmospheric music
- Multiple types of enemies
- 15 cool levels

- Use the left and right keys to go up the stairs, and if you climb a place other than the stairs, you will fall as it is!
- There is no time to worry in front of a fork in the road, a fierce monster chasing you!
- Every time you climb the stairs, you get various rewards and acquire beautiful girls!
- Climb high and break the best record.

The mission assigned to an anonymous undercover police officer involves eliminating all extraterrestrial beings on a clandestine planet. Equipped with a spacecraft, airborne pandas, and a hostile space rooster that will ferociously attack the aliens until their demise, the objective of the game is to advance through various levels. However, this task is far from simple, as there are various types of aliens that are actively attempting to impede your progress.
